items.name: restrict_type
items.title: Apply Restrictions On
items.tooltip: This determines restrictions rule to be applied on selected category or all categories of the group

items.name: restrict_in_category
items.title: Select Group Categories
items.tooltip: Set the restrictions based on the selected group's categories

items.name: total_submisssion
items.title: Total Groups
items.tooltip:
Set the total number of groups a user is allowed to create in EasySocial.

When restriction applied on 'specific group categories', the number of groups allowed is applied to each categories.

items.name: statusPublished
items.title: Publish Groups When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system publish the user's created groups that associated with the above selected group's categories based on user's subscription status.

items.name: statusUnpublished
items.title: UnPublish Groups When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system unpublish the user's created groups that associated with the above selected group's categories based on user's subscription status.
